wikitext.*:
'''Tolkien Gateway: Meetings''' were online regular meetings held on the first Sunday of every month at 8pm UTC. The meeting took place in the #Wiki channel of Tolkien Gateway's former IRC network. The specific time of each meeting for your time zone was available on each meeting page (see links below). Before each meeting users could put forward their ideas for discussion by using the talk page. In addition, users should note down their intention to attend using the same talk page. Transcripts for most meetings are available for non-attendees to read.
